tutorial_text.text:
VICTORY

There are two classes of victory: "Singing" and "Combat" victory.



SING VICTORY

A sing victory is the default victory, as it only requires surviving to the end of a song.



COMBAT VICTORY

A combat victory, meanwhile, requires the opponent's health to be reduced to 0 by the conclusion of the fight.



Victories may be restricted or required per song. On a song that disallows combat, only a sing victory is possible,

while some songs will force failure if the opponent is not defeated.

Any song that ends in story mode will give a chance to restart the song for an alternative victory condition, and

also a note for if an ending has a particular effect, such as a required combat victory or an alternate ending.
